Hello, I'm Aditya, a Xoogler with interest in Cloud and DevOps.

I love building tools that are user-friendly, simple and delightful.
I was an Cloud Engineering Intern @Google where I spent 3 months learning and building the fundamentals Cloud Technologies like Kubernetes, Anthos, etc. I also worked on an Infrastructure as a Code Tool (Terraform) where I optimised the Service Mesh Environment by writing Terraform. My competencies also include front-end and back-end web development, which I demonstrated during my internship @The Wizards.
Through these experiences, I had the opportunity to work with both small and large, specialised and cross-functional teams across different time zones and developed a working style that leans towards flexiblity, clarity and collaboration.
I'm currently looking for a new role as a developer. Hire me?
